***арап.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:арап.html>ара́п</a> (16410)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BFamp;action=editamp;section=14" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%8Aamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="арапъ (page does not exist)">арапъ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">arapŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Turkic_languages" class="extiw" title="w:Turkic languages">Turkic</a></span>; compare <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Turkish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Turkish language">Turkish</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="tr">Arap</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">Arab</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BFamp;action=editamp;section=16" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арап.html>ара́п</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">aráp</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арап.html>ара́па</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арап.html>ара́пы</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арап.html>ара́пов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">obsolete</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> Negro</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BFamp;action=editamp;section=18" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:негр.html>негр</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">negr</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>рап</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).

***арба.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:арба.html>арба́</a> (18446)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=11" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From a <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Turkic_languages" class="extiw" title="w:Turkic languages">Turkic</a></span> source. Ultimately from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Arabic" class="extiw" title="w:Arabic">Arabic</a></span> <i class="Arab mention" lang="ar">عَرَبَة</i> |  <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ar-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ʿaraba</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">vehicle</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=13" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арба.html>арба́</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">arbá</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арба.html>арбы́</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арба.html>арбы́</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арба.html>арб</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>araba (a horse- or bullock-drawn cart with two large wheels)
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>1829</b>,  <a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Alexander_Pushkin" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Alexander Pushkin">Alexander Pushkin</a>,  <cite>Тазит</cite>:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Cyrl e-quotation" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дорога.html>доро́гу</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:шествие.html>ше́ствие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:готовый.html>гото́во</a>, / <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тронуться.html>тро́нулась</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:арба.html>арба́</a></b>. <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>За</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>ней</a> / Адехи <a href = vnd.unilang:следовать.html>сле́дуют</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:суровый.html>сурово</a>, / <a href = vnd.unilang:смирять.html>Смиря́я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:молчать.html>молча</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пыл.html>пыл</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:конь.html>коней</a>...</span><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">V dorógu šéstvije gotóvo, / I trónulasʹ <b>arbá</b>. Za nej / Adexi slédujut suróvo, / Smirjája molča pyl konéj...</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">On the road the procession is ready and the <b>cart</b> has set off. The Adyge men follow grimly after it, silently subduing the ardor of the horses...</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li>
<li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>1891</b>,  Антон Павлович <a href = vnd.unilang:чех.html>Че́хов</a> (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Anton_Chekhov" class="extiw" title="w:Anton Chekhov">Anton Pavlovich Chekhov</a>),  “<a href="https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/ru:%D0%94%D1%83%D1%8D%D0%BB%D1%8C_(%D0%A7%D0%B5%D1%85%D0%BE%D0%B2)VI" class="extiw" title="s:ru:<a href = vnd.unilang:дуэль.html>Дуэ́ль</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:чех.html>Че́хов</a>)"><a href = vnd.unilang:дуэль.html>Дуэ́ль</a></a>”, in  <cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Novoye_Vremya_(newspaper)" class="extiw" title="w:Novoye Vremya (newspaper)"><a href = vnd.unilang:новый.html>Но́вое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мя</a></a></cite> |  republished as  “<a href="https://en.wikisource.Org/wiki/The_Duel_(Chekhov/Garnett)/Chapter_6" class="extiw" title="s:The Duel (Chekhov/Garnett)/Chapter 6">The Duel</a>”, in Larissa Volokhonsky; Richard Pevear, transl., <cite>The Complete Short Novels</cite>, 2004:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Cyrl e-quotation" lang="ru">Пррава! — <a href = vnd.unilang:кричать.html>крича́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:горло.html>го́рло</a> Самойленко, <a href = vnd.unilang:когда.html>когда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:попадаться.html>попада́лась</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:навстречу.html>навстре́чу</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:арба.html>арба́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> абхазец <a href = vnd.unilang:верх.html>ве́рхом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> осле.</span><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Prrava! — kričál vo vsjó górlo Samójlenko, kogdá popadálasʹ navstréču <b>arbá</b> íli abxázec verxóm na oslé.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">"Keep r-r-right!" Samoilenko shouted at the top of his lungs whenever they met a <b>native cart</b> or an Abkhazian riding a donkey.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li>
<li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>1888</b>,  Антон Павлович <a href = vnd.unilang:чех.html>Че́хов</a> (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Anton_Chekhov" class="extiw" title="w:Anton Chekhov">Anton Pavlovich Chekhov</a>),  “<a href="https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/ru:%D0%9A%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%86%D1%8B_(%D0%A7%D0%B5%D1%85%D0%BE%D0%B2,_1888)" class="extiw" title="s:ru:<a href = vnd.unilang:красавица.html>Краса́вицы</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:чех.html>Че́хов</a>, 1888)"><a href = vnd.unilang:красавица.html>Краса́вицы</a></a>”, in  <cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Novoye_Vremya_(newspaper)" class="extiw" title="w:Novoye Vremya (newspaper)"><a href = vnd.unilang:новый.html>Но́вое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мя</a></a></cite> |  republished as  “The Beauties”, in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Constance_Garnett" class="extiw" title="w:Constance Garnett">Constance Garnett</a>, transl., <cite>The Schoolmistress and other stories</cite> | <sup><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/cu31924014264661/page/n295">IA (Macmillan edition)</a></sup>, Chatto amp; Windus, 1920, page 289:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Cyrl e-quotation" lang="ru"><span class="q-hellip-sp"> | </span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b"> | </span> <a href = vnd.unilang:красивый.html>краси́во</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:изгибаться.html>изгиба́ясь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:под.html>под</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тяжесть.html>тя́жестью</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеба</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>она</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:побежать.html>побежа́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:через.html>че́рез</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двор.html>двор</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:гумно.html>гумну́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:шмыгнуть.html>шмы́гнула</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:через.html>че́рез</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:плетень.html>плете́нь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:окунуться.html>окуну́вшись</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:облако.html>о́блако</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:золотистый.html>золоти́стой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:половой.html>половы́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:скрыться.html>скры́лась</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:арба.html>арба́ми</a></b>.</span><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><span class="q-hellip-sp"> | </span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b"> | </span> krasívo izgibájasʹ pod tjážestʹju xléba, oná pobežála čérez dvor k gumnú, šmygnúla čérez pleténʹ i, okunúvšisʹ v óblako zolotístoj polóvy, skrýlasʹ za <b>árbami</b>.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><span class="q-hellip-sp"> | </span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b"> | </span> swaying gracefully under the weight of the bread, she ran across the yard to the threshing-floor, darted over the hurdle, and, wrapt in a cloud of golden chaff, vanished behind the <b>carts</b>.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li></ul></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ар.html>ар</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба́</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1d | // | 1b  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-арб-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:арбалет.html>арбале́т</a> (13091)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language">French</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr">arbalète</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=9" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арбалет.html>арбале́т</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">arbalét</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арбалет.html>арбале́та</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арбалет.html>арбале́ты</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:арбалет.html>арбале́тов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">weaponry</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> crossbow (mechanized weapon based on the bow), ballista</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ар.html>ар</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:лето.html>лет</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-арбалет-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%90%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Арбат (page does not exist)">Арбат</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">Arbát</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ский</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-skij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:арбатский.html>арба́тский</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 3a✕~.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-арбат-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ск</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b>.
</p>
